channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Post Snippets
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Post Snippets

item.title: CVE-2021-25010|2024-08-03T19:49:14.589Z -- unknown -- post%20snippets
item.description: The Post Snippets WordPress plugin before 3.1.4 does not have CSRF check when importing files, allowing attacker to make a logged In admin import arbitrary snippets. Furthermore, imported snippers are not sanitised and escaped, which could lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting issues
